p: The mucilage of P. major seeds (PMSM) was extracted based on the optimized method of Alizadeh Behbahani, Yazdi, Shahidi, Hesarinejad, et al. ( 2017), according to the following conditions: water to seed ratio of 60:1, pH 6.8, temperature 75°C, and 1.5‐hr extraction time. The PMSM was collected from the seed surfaces via an extractor, filtered, dried (45°C overnight), milled, sieved, and kept under cool and dry conditions.
